response.original_title: ゲーメスト ビデオ VOL.7 スーパーストリートファイターII
response.overview: Game Master Video Vol.7 Super Street Fighter II  Color / 90 min / Stereo / March 5, 1994  Shinseisha GV-007  I'll make it bloom!  The Flower of the Underworld...!  Unleash your deadly combo!!  Show us your incredible moves that will silence even crying children!!  ○Character Introductions  ・RYU  ・KEN  ・CHUN-LI  ・GUILE  ・BLANK  ・ZANGIEF  ・DHALSIM  ・E. HONDA  ・BISON  ・BALROG  ・SAGAT  ・VEGA  ・T. HAWK  ・FEI-LONG  ・CAMMY  ・DEE JAY  ○Who will rise to the top?! Tournament Battle  ○Take the fight! Combos  ○Defeat your rivals! Versus Play  ・Narrator: Tadashi Matsunaga
response.title: GAMEST VIDEO VOL.7 - SUPER STREET FIGHTER 2
